definition: to reflect on/to ponder over/aftertaste
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
taste/smell/(fig.) (noun suffix) feel/quality/sense/(TCM) classifier for ingredients of a medicine prescription
leaving a rich aftertaste/(fig.) memorable/lingering in memory

sentences.english: Taste mellow and deep, rich wine, lingering aftertaste and balance.
sentences.chinese: 口感醇厚深邃，酒香濃郁，回味綿長而均衡。

sentences.english: A harmonious wine with a long, fruity and spicyfinish.
sentences.chinese: 回味和諧悠長，餘留果味和辛香。

sentences.english: Full-bodied, soft and round, with a long finish.
sentences.chinese: 酒體豐腴，柔和而圓潤，回味雋永。

sentences.english: With flavor and aroma of baking, after drinking halls.
sentences.chinese: 帶焙火的韻味與香氣，飲後令人回味無窮。

sentences.english: Full bodied with balanced structure and satisfyingly smooth mouth feel.
sentences.chinese: 酒體豐滿，構架完整平衡，單寧柔和順滑，回味綿長。

sentences.english: The local dishes are robust and challenging, featuring mainly pork.
sentences.chinese: 地方菜口味濃重，令人回味無窮，以豬肉主料爲特色。

sentences.english: But a lot of Asians want that taste to linger.
sentences.chinese: 但很多亞洲人希望長久回味這一口感。

sentences.english: Full bodied, with sweet and round tannins, and a berry and spice aftertaste.
sentences.chinese: 酒體飽滿，單寧圓潤，回味中有莓果和香料的味道。

sentences.english: Long lingering finish of vanilla and sandalwood.
sentences.chinese: 而且，香草和白檀的回味悠長。

sentences.english: Ripe and mature-tasting pear and apple flavors , some spicy notes mixed in .
sentences.chinese: 略帶桃，蘋果香，口感成熟豐厚，回味複雜濃烈。

sentences.english: A wine of medium weight, it has length and structure from the zingy acid on the finish.
sentences.chinese: 酒體適中，酸酸的回味充滿活力，結構完美且持久。

sentences.english: Other side effects of fish oil may be fishy burps or a fishy aftertaste.
sentences.chinese: 魚油的其他副作用可能來自於其腥臭的氣味和回味。

sentences.english: Made with incredible finesse and balance, this semi-dry wine finishes crisp and clean.
sentences.chinese: 經精心釀造，這款半乾型酒回味酥脆乾爽。

sentences.english: Avery sophisticated wine with a delightful long after-taste.
sentences.chinese: 這是一款回味令人愉快的精緻葡萄酒。

sentences.english: The perspective of her essay is unique and language is irony and meaningful.
sentences.chinese: 她的散文視角獨特，語言輕俏多諷，耐人回味。

sentences.english: Balanced by crisp acidity for a long and memorable finish.
sentences.chinese: 酸度清脆平衡，餘味悠長，回味無窮。

to learn sth over again/to review/to brush up/to revive (memories, friendship etc)
to cherish the memory of/to think of/reminisce
to recollect/to recall (past times)/to look back
unforgettable
to recall/memories/CL:個|个[ge4]
to taste a small amount/to sample
to recall/to recollect/to think back
to remember/to recall/memory/CL:個|个[ge4]
meaningful/thought-provoking/significant
rich and mellow (flavor or aroma)
body odor/to appreciate a subtle taste
lit. to feel the taste in one's mouth (idiom)/fig. to water at the mouth/to drool in anticipation
to chew/to think over
taste/flavor/feeling
